alert.note: Alert for Linn; Sullivan (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 11:58PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Linn, eastern Grundy and southwestern Sullivan Counties through 1245 AM CDT... At 1157 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Galt, or 8 miles east of Trenton, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Trenton, Browning, Galt, Laredo, Purdin, Humphreys, Osgood and Reger. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for north central Missouri.
